decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to quickly and efficiently set up a combo using cards such as Ad Nauseam, Phyrexian Unlife, Angel's Grace, and Lightning Storm. By carefully managing your life total, manipulating your library, and protecting your combo pieces with Pact of Negation, you aim to assemble the necessary cards for a win condition. Utilizing mana acceleration with Pentad Prism and Lotus Bloom, as well as card draw spells like Sleight of Hand and Serum Visions, the deck focuses on a fast and consistent way to achieve victory.

The main concept of this Eldrazi Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy utilizing powerful Eldrazi creatures. By utilizing Eldrazi Temple and Eye of Ugin to ramp up mana quickly, the deck aims to play large threats like Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer ahead of schedule. Cards like Vile Aggregate and Eldrazi Skyspawner help to support the aggressive game plan by providing early threats and additional creatures to pressure the opponent. Overall, this deck aims to quickly close out games by presenting a fast and powerful board presence.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly deploy powerful Eldrazi creatures onto the battlefield and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive attacks. By utilizing mana ramp from Eldrazi Temple and Eye of Ugin, as well as disruptive effects from Thought-Knot Seer and Eldrazi Displacer, the deck aims to control the game and apply pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Reality Smasher and Drowner of Hope further enhances the aggro strategy, making it difficult for the opponent to stabilize and mount a defense.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying Eldrazi creatures that can disrupt the opponent's game plan and pressure them with aggressive threats. By utilizing powerful abilities like Eldrazi Displacer and Thought-Knot Seer, along with efficient mana acceleration from Eldrazi Temple and Eye of Ugin, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent early in the game. With a mix of disruptive elements and evasive threats, Eldrazi Aggro can quickly close out games while controlling the board presence.

The key concept of this Modern Eldrazi Aggro deck is to flood the board with powerful Eldrazi creatures at a rapid pace, using cards like Eldrazi Mimic, Reality Smasher, and Thought-Knot Seer to apply early pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck also includes versatile removal options like Dismember and Path to Exile to deal with threats while leveraging powerful lands such as Eye of Ugin and Eldrazi Temple to ramp and make bigger plays. By overwhelming the opponent with quick, efficient creatures and disruptive spells, this deck aims to win the game swiftly and decisively.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly play powerful Eldrazi creatures and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive attacks. By utilizing cards like Eldrazi Temple and Eye of Ugin, this deck can consistently cast high-impact Eldrazi creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and Reality Smasher early in the game. With disruptive spells like Path to Exile and Dismember for removal, and Eldrazi Displacer for versatile control, this deck aims to apply pressure and close out games swiftly. The variety of Eldrazi creatures in the deck allow for flexibility in playstyle and adaptation to different matchups.

The main focus of this deck is to flood the board with aggressive Eldrazi creatures and disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Thought-Knot Seer and Dismember. By combining powerful threats like Reality Smasher and Drowner of Hope with mana acceleration from lands like Eye of Ugin and Eldrazi Temple, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent and close out the game before they have a chance to stabilize. The inclusion of cards like Path to Exile and Eldrazi Displacer provide additional versatility and disruption options to control the pace of the game.

This deck focuses on quickly generating mana with Elves to ramp into powerful combo pieces like Ezuri, Renegade Leader and Heritage Druid. By using cards like Collected Company and Chord of Calling to search for key creatures and spells, the deck can quickly overwhelm opponents with a flood of Elves and powerful abilities. The inclusion of cards like Lightning Greaves and Elvish Champion provide protection and additional boosts to the Elf tribe, making it a formidable force in the Modern format.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells to quickly control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. With a mix of powerful creatures like Tarmogoyf and Dark Confidant, along with disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Liliana of the Veil, the deck aims to apply early pressure while maintaining a strong board presence. The inclusion of cards like Abrupt Decay and Terminate provide versatile removal options, while Kolaghan's Command offers additional utility and value. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of aggression and disruption.

This Abzan Aggro deck focuses on efficiently removing threats from the opponent while deploying powerful creatures like Tarmogoyf, Wilt-Leaf Liege, and Loxodon Smiter to pressure them. The deck also utilizes disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Lingering Souls to control the game and gain advantage. The mana base consists of fetch lands and dual lands to ensure consistent mana production. Overall, the deck aims to control the board early and overwhelm the opponent with efficient threats.

The core principle of this deck is to disrupt your opponent's game plan by controlling the top of their deck with cards like Lantern of Insight and Codex Shredder. This allows you to deny them resources and key cards, while also locking them out of attacking with Ensnaring Bridge. The deck also utilizes hand disruption spells like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize to further disrupt your opponent's strategy. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Ghirapur Aether Grid and Pyrite Spellbomb for additional removal and win conditions.

This deck focuses on utilizing graveyard synergies to quickly fill the graveyard with cards like Faithless Looting and Life from the Loam, and then using cards like Conflagrate and Zombie Infestation to take advantage of those filled graveyards. By dredging cards like Stinkweed Imp and Golgari Brownscale, the deck aims to keep the graveyard full and constantly have resources to work with. This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of creatures and burn spells, while also having access to disruptive cards like Vengeful Pharaoh and Lingering Souls to control the battlefield.
